import pytest
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.ml.linalg import DenseVector



[docs]@pytest.fixture(autouse=True)
def spark_session():
    spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("Testing App").getOrCreate()
    return spark




[docs]@pytest.fixture(autouse=True)
def binary_classifier_transformed_result(spark_session):
    data = [
        (0, DenseVector([19.435, -19.345]), DenseVector([0.99, 0.027]), 0.0),
        (0, DenseVector([19.345, -19.108]), DenseVector([0.99, 0.027]), 0.0),
        (0, DenseVector([16.148, -16.148]), DenseVector([0.99, 0.704]), 0.0),
        (0, DenseVector([5.455, -5.455]), DenseVector([0.99, 0.004]), 0.0),
        (0, DenseVector([-22.127, 21.127]), DenseVector([0.10, 0.893]), 1.0),
        (0, DenseVector([-22.127, 21.127]), DenseVector([0.10, 0.993]), 1.0),
        (1, DenseVector([-22.127, 21.127]), DenseVector([0.10, 0.793]), 1.0),
        (1, DenseVector([-22.127, 21.127]), DenseVector([0.10, 0.693]), 1.0),
        (1, DenseVector([-22.127, 21.127]), DenseVector([0.10, 0.653]), 1.0),
        (1, DenseVector([-22.127, 21.127]), DenseVector([0.70, 0.253]), 0.0),
        (1, DenseVector([-22.127, 21.127]), DenseVector([0.90, 0.293]), 0.0),
    ]
    cols = ("label", "rawPrediction", "probability", "prediction")
    pdf = spark_session.createDataFrame(data, cols)
    return pdf

def multiclass_classifier_transformed_result(spark_session):
    data = [
        (
            0,
            DenseVector([19.108, -19.108, -22.32]),
            DenseVector([0.95, 0.04, 0.01]),
            0.0,
        ),
        (
            0,
            DenseVector([19.108, -19.108, 54.453]),
            DenseVector([0.98, 0.02, 0.02]),
            0.0,
        ),
        (
            0,
            DenseVector([16.148, -16.148, 56.340]),
            DenseVector([0.90, 0.10, 0.10]),
            0.0,
        ),
        (
            1,
            DenseVector([-22.127, 21.127, -22.43]),
            DenseVector([0.10, 0.60, 0.30]),
            1.0,
        ),
        (
            1,
            DenseVector([-42.127, 23.127, -211.9]),
            DenseVector([0.050, 0.05, 0.9]),
            2.0,
        ),
        (
            1,
            DenseVector([-62.127, 21.127, 33.655]),
            DenseVector([0.90, 0.09, 0.01]),
            1.0,
        ),
        (
            2,
            DenseVector([29.127, -21.127, -2.222]),
            DenseVector([0.20, 0.08, 0.72]),
            2.0,
        ),
        (
            2,
            DenseVector([-22.127, 331.17, -24.44]),
            DenseVector([0.90, 0.03, 0.07]),
            0.0,
        ),
        (
            2,
            DenseVector([-22.127, 21.127, 111.23]),
            DenseVector([0.10, 0.20, 0.70]),
            2.0,
        ),
    ]
    cols = ("label", "rawPrediction", "probability", "prediction")
    pdf = spark_session.createDataFrame(data, cols)
    return pdf




[docs]@pytest.fixture(autouse=True)
def normal_regressor_transformed_result(spark_session):
    data = [
        (-28.98343821, -27.0),
        (20.21491975, 21.5),
        (-25.98418959, -22.0),
        (30.69731842, 33.0),
        (74.69283752, 71.0),
    ]
    dataset = spark_session.createDataFrame(data, ["prediction", "label"])
    return dataset
